104.speaker: Halsin, Jaheira, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, Wyll
104.text: There is no room for me, I am afraid. Perhaps dismiss another, then I can join you.

97.speaker: Player
97.text: All right. Meet me at camp.

76.speaker: Player
76.text: Take Astarion's place - he can head back to camp.

61.speaker: Narrator
61.text: *Your companion is otherwise engaged. You'll need to dismiss them at a more convenient moment.*

31.speaker: Astarion
31.text: I would object, but sitting by the fire while you do all the hard work sounds marvellous, actually.
31.context: NodeContext: Astarion speaking to the companion origin character that's replacing him in the party. "Them" refers to the player's avatar characer.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Gale could do with a rest.

41.speaker: Gale
41.text: Keeping your greatest weapon in reserve, eh? An excellent strategy.

89.speaker: Jaheira
89.text: Well. I know when I'm not wanted.
89.context: NodeContext: Well. I know when I'm not wanted. - not shitty, just gentle faux haughtiness

99.speaker: Karlach
99.context: NodeContext: A bit immature bad attitude. Player has told her to swap with someone else who wants to join the party.

73.speaker: Minsc
73.text: Let us lay down a while, Boo. Do not think I have missed your cantenkery today.

92.speaker: Shadowheart
92.text: If you insist. Don't have all the fun without me.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You can trade places with Wyll.

94.speaker: Wyll
94.text: All right. I know a shortcut.

84.speaker: Halsin
84.text: I shall be waiting. Come find me when you need me.

101.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
101.text: I will wait in camp. Patiently, even.

14.speaker: Halsin, Jaheira, Lae'zel, Shadowheart, Wyll
14.text: Take your time, my friend! Boo shall snooze a while longer.
